| HistoryText             = The Rosetti Family were a crime family that were involved in the waste management business. It had the contract that serviced trash collection where the [[Frank Castle (Earth-616)|Punisher]] had his safehouse in New Jersey. They were warring with the [[Mecozzi Family (Earth-616)|Mecozzi Family]] for control of the waste disposal racket.{{r|Punisher Vol 2 6|7}}
